errorhandler.script:
#!/bin/bash #/ usage: kill.sh ?dir?
set -e set -u
[[ $# != 1 ]] && { grep '^#/ usage:' <"$0" | cut -c4- >&2 exit 2 } DIR=$1 mtl attribute -n web:kill.time -v "$(date)"
echo 'Web killed!'

command.script:
#!/bin/bash #/ usage: stop.sh ?dir? ?method? set -eu [[ $# != 2 ]] && { grep '^#/ usage:' <"$0" | cut -c4- >&2 exit 2 } DIR=$1 METHOD=$2
if [[ -f $DIR/pid ]] then pid=$(cat $DIR/pid) # kill $pid ; rm -f $DIR/pid echo "- Web stopped (pid=${pid}) using method: $METHOD"
mtl attribute -n web:pid --remove else echo "- Web already stopped." fi
mtl attribute -n web:state -v DOWN
